item.mana-and-artifice.book_of_rote.part: %s is not rote, you cannot cast this spell using this book.

我需要为《阿卡纳仪式》收集以下试剂：
item.mana-and-artifice.entrapment_crysta: 该水晶持有的实体无法解析
item.mana-and-artifice.guide_book.magic_: 当您将书拿在手中时，您会感到不得不打开书本。 您浏览了几页，而在不知不觉中，深入阅读已经花费了数小时。 您的思想已被打开，您感受到魔力般的能量在您周围旋转。 您已经解开了奥秘的秘密！
item.mana-and-artifice.crystal_of_memori: The crystal is full with %d experience
返回XP。 潜行+右键单击以更改。
以XP。 潜行+右键单击以更改。
item.mana-and-artifice.item-with-gui.ope: Open by holding %s and right clicking
item.mana-and-artifice.manaweaver_wand.c: You hold the wand in your hand and swear you feel a current of energy deep within it, but try as you might you can't make anything happen.  You will need to learn more before you continue.
item.mana-and-artifice.manaweaver_wand.l: You lack the knowledge and skill to perform this pattern right now.
item.mana-and-artifice.broken_repair_pro: This armor is broken, but all is not lost!  Take it to a runic anvil and repair it with infused silk and a sorcerous sewing set.
item.mana-and-artifice.ritual_kit.store_: The Ritual Pattern couldn't be stored.  Check the pattern and reagents to make sure it's all there.
item.mana-and-artifice.ritual_kit.not_ki: This ritual cannot be stored in a ritual kit.
item.mana-and-artifice.ritual_kit.not_en: The ritual kit doesn't have enough items to place the ritual.
item.mana-and-artifice.rune_warding.ward: 一个神奇的病房阻止了你！
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.shift_promp: Press SHIFT to see detailed information
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.alt_prompt: Press ALT to see required reagents
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.tier-fail: You lack the knowledge and experience to cast this spell right now.
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.complexity-: This spell is currently too complex for you to manage.
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.faction-fai: This spell is not castable by your faction.
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.reagents-mi: You are missing the required reagents to cast this spell.
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.no-magic: You aren't quite sure what to do with this item at this time.
mana-and-artifice:mage_armor_set_bonus: (4) Set Bonus: +50 Max Mana, +25% Mana Regen
block.mana-and-artifice.runic_anvil.low_: You feel like this might work, but you don't have the skill or knowledge to complete it at this time.
block.mana-and-artifice.occulus.confusio: You gaze into the floating crystal and feel your consciousness being drawn into it.  You quickly close your eyes and turn away.  You will need to learn more about this strange device before you can use it.
helptip.mana-and-artifice.ritual_empty_h: Did you know?  You can right click these runes with an empty hand and it will try to pull the item it's looking for from your inventory automatically!
helptip.mana-and-artifice.pin_recipe: Having to keep looking up a recipe?  You can pin it to your HUD using the pin button at the top left of the recipe!
gui.mana-and-artifice.name-spell: 选择一个图标并命名您的咒语！
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.ash_mi: You don't have enough Arcane Ash.
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.output: There is a spell in the output slot.
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.compon: 该成分不能处于引导法术中。
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.low_ti: Your tier is too low to scribe this spell.
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.too_co: This spell is too complex for your current tier.
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.wrong_: Your faction cannot craft this spell.
gui.mana-and-artifice.tier_progress: Complete %d of the %d tasks to advance to the next tier:
gui.mana-and-artifice.your_tier_max: You are at the maximum tier.
gui.mana-and-artifice.recipe.wrongfactio: 配方需要其他派系赋予您的权力。
gui.mana-and-artifice.hud_mode.condition: Only show HUD when holding something that uses mana
gui.mana-and-artifice.codex_mode.esc_out: ESC closes the codex, UI buttons go back
gui.mana-and-artifice.codex_mode.esc_ui_: ESC/UI Buttons go back, ESC closes the codex only from index
gui.mana-and-artifice.codex_mode.rmouse_: Right Click/UI Buttons go back, ESC closes the codex
Right Click/UI/ESC go back, ESC closes the codex only from index
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ritual_f: The entity isn't responding...perhaps it's due to your other allegiances?
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ally_dem: You feel the hellfire flowing through you, yet it no longer burns.  You have allied yourself with the Demons of the Nether!
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ally_fey: You feel the warmth of summer on one side of your face and the chill of winter on the other.  You have allied yourself with the Faerie Courts!
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ally_anc: You feel the presence of hundreds of wizards current and past, their knowledge and power shared with you.  You have allied yourself with the Council of Ancients!
mana-and-artifice:rituals/return.not_fou: 找不到具有该组合的返回点。
mana-and-artifice:rituals/summon.wrong_d: %s is out of your magic's reach.
mana-and-artifice:rituals/summon.not_fou: The specified player was not found (probably offline or an unset player charm).
mana-and-artifice:rituals/visit.wrong_di: %s is out of your magic's reach.
mana-and-artifice:rituals/visit.not_foun: The specified player was not found (probably offline or an unset player charm).

mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.read: 您已经获得了足够的经验，可以晋升！ 检查Oculus以继续。
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t1_m: Craft something at a Manaweaving Altar
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t1_s: Craft a spell with complexity 15 or more
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t1_c: Advance by resting at a bed and meditating on what you've learned.
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t2_s: Craft a spell with complexity 35 or more
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t2_m: Craft an elemental mote using one of the six Mote rituals
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t2_c: Craft a construct with at least 3 wood or stone parts
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t2_a: Add a modifier to a spell using the Ritual of Alteration
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t2_r: Make a charcoal print of a scribed rune at the Runic Anvil
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t2_c: Advance by choosing and completing one of the following rituals:
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t3_s: Craft a spell with complexity 55 or more
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t3_e: Enchant an item using the Runic Anvil
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t3_a: Explore all 42 biomes of the Overworld
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t3_f: 在Manaweaving祭坛上从您的派系中制造一件文物
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t3_c: 制作至少包含3个铁或金零件的结构
通过完成以下仪式来前进：
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t4_s: Craft a spell with complexity 75 or more
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t4_e: 使用符文铁砧附魔等级达到III级或更高的物品
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t4_c: Craft a construct with at least 3 obsidian parts
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t4_r: Upgrade a Runeforge to a Brimstone Forge using a Brimstone Charm
mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.t4_c: Advance by completing the following ritual:
item.mana-and-artifice.construct_control: 您当前没有命令构造。 在构造上使用此标尺命令它。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ma: 我有一个法力大炮，但没有法力躯干，所以我没有法力。 我不能在远距离进攻。 如果可以的话，我会混战的。
我有一个法力加农炮，但没有任何法力加成，我无法在远距离攻击。 如果可以的话，我会混战的。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.no: %s tried to tell me to do something, but I don't have to listen to them.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ar: This working area's a little too big for me boss.  Needs to be no more than %d blocks on any side.  This one is %d x %d x %d
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ca: I need to be able to %s in order to help you with this, sorry boss.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.co: This Lodestar is a lot to handle, I'm getting confused...I'll just start over.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.su: This Lodestar command (index %d) doesn't seem to exist...I think this might be a bug.  I'm skipping it.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.mo: I can't figure out how to get to %.2f, %.2f, %.2f
I can't figure out how to get to %s
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.te: The block I'm looking for isn't the right type, did it get broken?  I'll skip this.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ac: I would activate the block like you asked, but it either isn't configured or doesn't exist.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: I can't place anything in this %s...I don't have anything in my hands.  I'll skip this.
I wasn't able to put %s into the %s.  Sorry boss.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.in: This %s doesn't seem to be able to hold items.  I'll skip this.  Hope that's okay.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ta: I can't take anything from this %s...I don't have any empty hands.  I'll skip this.
I wasn't able to take anything from the %s.  Sorry boss.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ha: I found some plants, I'll keep an eye on them!
I can't find any fully grown plant blocks in the area you specified.  Sorry boss.
I would like to harvest plants like you asked, but the area either isn't configured or doesn't exist
I'm looking through the area you set up for plant blocks.
I thought the block at %d, %d, %d was valid, but it isn't now (I see a %s).  I'll skip it.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: I found some good places with soil, I'll keep an eye on them!
I can't find any empty soil blocks in the area you specified.  Sorry boss.
I would like to plant these seeds like you asked, but the area either isn't configured or doesn't exist
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.so: I'm looking through the area you set up for soil blocks.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: I'm planting %s at %d, %d, %d.  There you go little seed.  All safe!
I can't plant right now, I don't have any seeds in my hand.  Sorry boss.
I thought the block at %d, %d, %d was valid, but it isn't now (I see a %s).  I'll skip it.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ru: I couldn't figure out the recipe from the paper that's in the table...this might be a bug, but double check it?
I don't have a recipe to scribe, so I'll have to skip this step.
I don't see a slate in the Runescribing Table here, so I'll need to skip this.
I see an item in the Runescribing Table here but it isn't a slate, so I'll need to skip this.
Done scribing!  Some of my best work.
This runic anvil isn't set up to make anything right now.  Need two items boss!
This doesn't look like a recipe I can runeforge, boss.  I don't see how these can go together.
I'm not a high enough tier to make this, boss.  I'm sorry.
Done forging the %s.  Very cool, boss!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.re: This was a workbench, but it isn't anymore...I'll just wait here.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.bu: I see a %s that's ready for butchering.
I'd be happy to thin the herd for you boss but I don't have the area set up yet.
I don't see enough targets to butcher, I'll skip this for now.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: 老板，如果我不抱着一个，我就不能放一个积木。
老板，我无法在此处放置障碍物，该区域不清楚。
老板，我无法把这个方块放在你要求我去的地方。 对不起。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.br: I don't have any items to breed right now boss.
I don't see enough targets to breed right now boss, I'll skip this for now.
I found %d %ss, I'll try to breed them for you boss.
I don't have the right item to breed those, boss.
我现在不能为您饲养任何动物老板，您尚未配置该区域。
Got some %ss breeding for you boss.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pa: Hostile %s is down boss, going pack to patrol.
我没有什么要巡逻的老板，我将跳过这一点。
这轮巡逻队老板做完了。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.fo: I'll follow and guard you boss!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.at: I see a %s that's a threat!  I'll protect you boss!  En garde, villain!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.le: This %s isn't vanquished yet but you're too far away, boss!  Wait for me!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.vi: I've slain the vile %s boss.  On my way back to you.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.dr: 我现在不能丢东西，老板，我什么也没带。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.sh: I don't see anything that I can shear right now boss, I'll skip this.
I sheared the %s for you boss.
I see %d targets that are ready for shearing, I'm on it boss!
I thought %s was shearable, but when I got here, now I see it's not.  Sorry boss!
我会开始为您的老板剪毛，但您尚未在lodestar中配置该区域。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.de: 再见老板 我希望我做得很好。 我爱你。
mana-and-artifice:advancements.root.desc: 开始您的神秘艺术之旅
mana-and-artifice:advancements.mine_vint: 这种奇怪的矿石发出暗蓝色的脉冲。 我想知道如果我将其熔炼会怎样？
mana-and-artifice:advancements.smelt_vin: 从那块奇怪的矿石中遗留下来的灰尘似乎具有较小的磁性。 也许我应该把它和铁结合起来？
mana-and-artifice:advancements.combine_v: 我是正确的！ 灰尘粘在铁板上！ 它似乎从我的手的热量中略微融化了……我应该再冶炼吗？
mana-and-artifice:advancements.re_smelt_: 这种金属是不可思议的。 我应该多做一些，然后看看是否有村民对这笔交易感兴趣。
mana-and-artifice:advancements.villager_: 这本书有很多秘密。 我应该读它，以继续我进入奥术世界的旅程。
